mapper.sql: XCXX_ID, XCXX_TITLE, XCXX_XCLB, XCXX_FBSJ, XCXX_KQZT, XCXX_ADDUSER, XCXX_ADDTIME, XCXX_ADDCOMPANY, XCXX_CHECKSTATUS, XCXX_CHECKUSER,XCXX_CHECKMSG, XCXX_CHECKTIME, XCXX_DELFLAG
mapper.select:
select count(*) from XCXX where XCXX_DELFLAG=1
and XCXX_ADDUSER = '${xcxxAdduser}'
and XCXX_ADDUSER in (select zzjg_id from ZZJG where ZZJG_SJDW = '${xcxxAdduser}') or XCXX_CHECKSTATUS = '待集团审核'
and XCXX_TITLE like '%${keywords}%'
and XCXX_CHECKSTATUS = '${xcxxCheckstatus}'

select * from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from XCXX T where XCXX_DELFLAG = 1
and XCXX_ADDUSER = '${xcxxAdduser}'
and XCXX_ADDUSER in (select zzjg_id from ZZJG where ZZJG_SJDW = '${xcxxAdduser}') or XCXX_CHECKSTATUS = '待集团审核'
and XCXX_TITLE like '%${keywords}%'
and XCXX_CHECKSTATUS = '${xcxxCheckstatus}'
order by T.XCXX_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by XCXX_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by XCXX_ADDTIME desc

select count(*) from XCXX where XCXX_DELFLAG=1
and XCXX_ADDUSER = '${xcxxAdduser}'
and XCXX_ADDUSER in (select zzjg_id from ZZJG where ZZJG_SJDW = '${xcxxAdduser}')
and XCXX_TITLE like '%${keywords}%'
and XCXX_CHECKSTATUS = '${xcxxCheckstatus}'

select * from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from XCXX T where XCXX_DELFLAG = 1
and XCXX_ADDUSER = '${xcxxAdduser}'
and XCXX_ADDUSER in (select zzjg_id from ZZJG where ZZJG_SJDW = '${xcxxAdduser}')
and XCXX_TITLE like '%${keywords}%'
and XCXX_CHECKSTATUS = '${xcxxCheckstatus}'
order by T.XCXX_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by XCXX_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by XCXX_ADDTIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into XCXX (XCXX_ID, XCXX_TITLE, XCXX_XCLB, XCXX_FBSJ, XCXX_KQZT, XCXX_ADDUSER, XCXX_ADDTIME, XCXX_ADDCOMPANY, XCXX_CHECKSTATUS, XCXX_CHECKUSER,XCXX_CHECKMSG, XCXX_CHECKTIME, XCXX_DELFLAG, XCXX_CONTENT) values (#{xcxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxXclb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxFbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xcxxKqzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxAdduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xcxxAddcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxCheckstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxCheckuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxCheckmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xcxxChecktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xcxxDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xcxxContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update XCXX
XCXX_TITLE = #{xcxxTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCXX_XCLB = #{xcxxXclb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCXX_FBSJ = #{xcxxFbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
XCXX_KQZT = #{xcxxKqzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCXX_ADDUSER = #{xcxxAdduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCXX_ADDTIME = #{xcxxAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
XCXX_ADDCOMPANY = #{xcxxAddcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCXX_CHECKSTATUS = #{xcxxCheckstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCXX_CHECKUSER = #{xcxxCheckuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCXX_CHECKMSG = #{xcxxCheckmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XCXX_CHECKTIME = #{xcxxChecktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
XCXX_DELFLAG = #{xcxxDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
XCXX_CONTENT = #{xcxxContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where XCXX_ID = #{xcxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update XCXX set XCXX_TITLE = #{xcxxTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XCXX_XCLB = #{xcxxXclb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XCXX_FBSJ = #{xcxxFbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XCXX_KQZT = #{xcxxKqzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XCXX_ADDUSER = #{xcxxAdduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XCXX_ADDTIME = #{xcxxAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XCXX_ADDCOMPANY = #{xcxxAddcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XCXX_CHECKSTATUS = #{xcxxCheckstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XCXX_CHECKUSER = #{xcxxCheckuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XCXX_CHECKMSG = #{xcxxCheckmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XCXX_CHECKTIME = #{xcxxChecktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XCXX_DELFLAG = #{xcxxDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, XCXX_CONTENT = #{xcxxContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where XCXX_ID = #{xcxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
